## GeometryKindSet class

A set of \[\[GeometryKind\]\]s.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class GeometryKindSet extends Set 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [hasIntersection(set)](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.hasintersection.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if the Set intersects Set 'set'. |
|  [hasOrIntersects(set)](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.hasorintersects.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if the Set either intersects Set 'set' (if set is a Set), of has element 'set' if set is not a Set. |
|  [hasOrIntersectsArray(subset)](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.hasorintersectsarray.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if this set and the array of elements share at least a single element. |
|  [isSuperset(subset)](./harp-datasource-protocol.geometrykindset.issuperset.md) |  | Return <code>true</code> if the Set is a superset of the set 'subset'. |
